tip: Process of increasing speed.
Quality of being well meaning and kind.
A prolonged public disagreement.
Firmness of purpose.
A feeling of great pleasure; magical.
An irregular rising and falling in number or amount.
Quality of being magnificent or splendid.
A proposed explanation made on the basis of limited evidence.
The quality of being honest and having strong moral principles.
Fact of two things being seen or placed close together with contrasting effect.
Relating to or resulting from motion.
Geographic coordinate that specifies the east-west position of a point on the Earth's surface.
Showing great attention to detail; very careful and precise.
Sentimentality for the past, typically for a period or place with happy personal associations.
Process of making something as fully perfect, functional, or effective as possible.
The ability to see, hear, or become aware of something through the senses.
A state of isolation to prevent the spread of disease.
Capacity to recover quickly from difficulties.
Avoidance of the depletion of natural resources to maintain ecological balance.
Allowing light, but not detailed shapes, to pass through.
The process of being united or made into a whole.
Recognition or affirmation that a person or their feelings or opinions are valid.
The distance between successive crests of a wave, especially points in a sound wave or electromagnetic wave.
The supposed generation of offspring completely and permanently different from the parent.
A feeling of intense longing for something.
The quality of being open to more than one interpretation; inexactness.
Capable of being decomposed by bacteria or other living organisms.
The art of writing or solving codes.
A reduction in the value of an asset over time.
A feeling or state of intense excitement and happiness.
The quality of bending easily without breaking.
Fond of company; sociable.
A modest or low view of one's own importance.
The action or process of innovating.
A feeling of great happiness and triumph.
Something on which associated things depend.
The intensity of light emitted from a surface per unit area in a given direction.
The fact of being generous or forgiving, especially toward a rival or less powerful person.
In the form of a cloud or haze; hazy.
The action of making something obscure, unclear, or unintelligible.
Division into two sharply contrasting groups or sets of opinions or beliefs.
The most perfect or typical example of a quality or class.
The action or process of making someone or something look or feel better, younger, or more vital.
The combination of ideas to form a theory or system.
Relating to the healing of disease.
The state of being everywhere at once (or seeming to be everywhere at once).
The language or dialect spoken by the ordinary people in a particular country or region.
A strong desire to travel.
Make (a problem, bad situation, or negative feeling) worse.
Produce or provide (a natural, agricultural, or industrial product).
